entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Portage la Prairie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:00 p.m. CDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries and periods of drizzle with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 5:53 PM CDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Snow mixed with rain late in the morning. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:53 PM CDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 5:53 PM CDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
